Mason’s Creamery

With folks from Conference Organizers Chat community: Jon Banafato and Elaine Wong.

Arctica Gelato

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ North Bay Python 2023
item.description:
Angela’s Organic Ice Cream Petaluma

After giving my talk (PEP Talk) at North Bay Python in July 2023, I went to Angela’s Organic Ice Cream in Downtown Petaluma for a Lavender Ice cream.

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by Mariatta Wijaya (@mariatta81)

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCon US 2023
item.description:
PyCon US 2023 was really special üòä I get to do Ice cream selfies with various people!

Rockwell Ice Cream

With Ned Batchelder (photo taken by Ned Batchelder, from his blog post here. We went to Rockwell Ice Cream.

We ran into Drazen Lucic while at Rockwell Ice Cream.

Capo Gelateria Italiana

With Georgi Ker, Cheuk-Ting Ho, and Zac Hatfield-Dodds at Capo Gelateria Italiana.

Never too late to post our #icecreamselfie with @mariatta @cheukting_ho and Zac to get 1 point @pycon US. pic.twitter.com/Uc3ItPOBcM

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ Python Brasil 2022
item.description:
Del Monte Gelateria

I found Del Monte Gelateria inside Manaura shopping mall, which was walking distance from the hotel I was staying. I had trouble choosing a flavor because everything looks so good!

Most people don’t speak english very well, but I was able to order what I want by pointing at the display üòù

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by Mariatta Wijaya (@mariatta81)

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCon Colombia 2022
item.description:
Cows Ice Cream Whistler

I gave a keynote speech at PyCon Colombia. It was an online event, so I didn’t actually get to have ice cream in Colombia. Perhaps one day.

While on a camping trip to Whistler, I decided to get my Ice Cream Selfie at Cows Ice cream, which is a favorite place for us. Each time we’re there, there’s always a long lineup.

üç¶üòùü§≥ #IceCreamSelfie for @pyconcolombia #PyConColombia2022
Accompanied by my kids to @COWSICECREAM in Whistler.
I got the "Brownie Explosion" and "Wowie Cowie" ice cream üòã pic.twitter.com/fSy4HavO2H

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCon APAC 2021
item.description:
Bella Gelateria

I gave a keynote speech at PyCon APAC 2021, which was hosted by PyCon Thailand. This was an online event, so I didn’t actually go to Thailand for this. However, I found an ice cream flavour that represent Thailand: Thai Coconut Milk Gelato from Bella Gelateria!

Bella Gelateria has one of the best ice cream in Vancouver, they’ve won many awards!

Belated #IceCreamSelfie for @pyconapac @pyconthailand
üáπüá≠üêç üç¶üòùü§≥
Trekked all the way to Vancouver to find Thai Coconut Milk gelato from @bellagelateria pic.twitter.com/G3CjqJAHFS

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ GitHub Global Maintainer Summit 2021
item.description:
Snowy Village

I gave a talk about The Bots of CPython at GitHub Global Maintainer Summit. It was an online event, so I looked for local ice cream shops where I live.

Snowy Village is my kids favorite place here. They really love the bingsu, which is milk-based Korean shaved ice dessert.

Bingsu counts as ice cream! #IceCreamSelfie üç¶üòùü§≥ @ Snowy Village pic.twitter.com/ZKqlTZkZUK

— Mariatta ü§¶ (@mariatta) June 17, 2021

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCon US 2021
item.description:
Vashti Rose In-House Made Ice Cream

If you ever come to Port Moody, you must make a stop at Vashti Rose In-House Made Ice Cream. All of their ice creams are made from scratch locally, and they have vegan options too.

üç¶üòùü§≥ The time has come for #IceCreamSelfie #PyCon #PyConUS #PyConUS2021
Whiskey Hazelnut and Chocolate Brownie Ice Cream @ Vashti Rose Ice Cream pic.twitter.com/eUmMbIKECH

— Mariatta ü§¶ (@mariatta) May 15, 2021

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCon Belarus 2021
item.description:
Matteo’s Gelato

I went to Matteo’s Gelato in Port Coquitlam for this one, after first taking a stroll along Coquitlam River @ Lions Park.

Cr√®me br√ªl√©e and chocolate hazelnut gelato from Matteo's Gelato in Port Coquitlam. My reward for giving @pyconby closing keynote.
üç¶üòùü§≥ #IceCreamSelfie pic.twitter.com/i3zume2skU

— Mariatta ü§¶ (@mariatta) March 14, 2021

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCascades 2021
item.description:
At PyCascades 2021, I was on a panel with Guido van Rossum, Carol Willing, Brett Cannon, and Nina Zakharenko, so after that was done, I asked them to do an ice cream selfie with me. I’m glad they all obliged! üòä

I had the Nestle DRUMSTICK Sundae Cone.

A very special virtual #IceCreamSelfie with @WillingCarol @brettsky @nnja @gvanrossum #pycascades
üç¶üòùü§≥ pic.twitter.com/MXUn0E3jRq

— Mariatta ü§¶ (@mariatta) February 20, 2021

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ SeaGL, PyCon Indonesia, PyCon Poland 2020
item.description:
It was 2020. I joined so many virtual conferences, and at one point, I was a speaker at three different conferences all in one same weekend.

2020 was also, a challenging time, I didn’t get to go out a lot. I didn’t even get to do my Ice cream selfie after the conference.

Finally, on new year’s eve, we decided to celebrate and go out. While in Robson Street, we stopped by a Korean grocery store and my kids saw some boba milk tea ice cream bar for sale. So I decided to do my ice cream selfie at that time.

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCon Australia, and PyCon Taiwan 2020
item.description:
Rocky Point Ice Cream

2020, the year of virtual conferences for me. I get to speak at two different conferences happening in the same weekend: PyCon Australia, and PyCon Taiwan.

I decided to just get two scoops of ice cream from one shop. This is from Rocky Point Ice Cream.

Thanks @pyconau and @PyConTW for having me!
I gave talk at two conferences in the same weekend so I think I deserve the two scoops of ice cream from @RPIceCream (I picked matcha green tea and espresso flakes flavours)#IceCreamSelfie üç¶üòùü§≥ pic.twitter.com/i1PFurh2iH

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCon US 2020
item.description:
PyCon US 2020 was cancelled, but I still decided to record a tutorial for it.

Since everything was still closed down at that time, so I just bought some ice cream and ice cream cones from the grocery store.

Just doing #IceCreamSelfie in my own backyard üç¶üòùü§≥ pic.twitter.com/CiwD4c4fl1

— Mariatta ü§¶ (@mariatta) April 24, 2020

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCascades 2020
item.description:
Fifty Licks Ice Cream

Elaine Wong, Lorena Mesa, and I, we gave a talk together about 9 Years of PyLadies.

To celebrate, we went to Fifty Licks Ice Cream, for their legend-dairy (and non-dairy) ice cream.

Achievement unlocked! @pyladies #IceCreamSelfie with @loooorenanicole @elthenerd #pycascades2020 @FiftyLicks pic.twitter.com/82jdEhWIqK

— Mariatta ü§¶ (@mariatta) February 9, 2020

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ GitHub Universe 2019
item.description:
Uji Time Dessert

After giving my talk, “Don’t be a Robot; automating workflows at scale” at GitHub Universe, I decided to spend some time exploring Japantown in San Francisco, and stumbled upon this place. It is so unique so I decided to get my ice cream there.

Check out Uji Time Dessert for their matcha ice cream and taiyaki cones!

üç¶üòùü§≥ Matcha ice cream with taiyaki cone and red bean topping ü§§
My fanciest #IceCreamSelfie so far! #GitHubUniverse pic.twitter.com/WnJgIuOjsM

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCon DE 2019
item.description:
Hokey Pokey

Lucie recommended this place, and we met up and get to chat and catch up.

Check out Eispatisserie Hokey Pokey in Berlin!

A special #IceCreamSelfie with @Patjouk #PyConDE
üç¶üòùü§≥ pic.twitter.com/SFoQy6JI1x

— Mariatta ü§¶ (@mariatta) October 13, 2019

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ Zapier Fall Retreat 2019
item.description:
Wonders Ice Cream

During Zapier’s Retreat, I gave a quick ignite talk about public speaking. Afterwards, with a few other Zapiens, we went to Wonders Ice Cream for Rolled Ice Cream.

Unfortunately, I learned that this place has since closed down üòî

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by Mariatta Wijaya (@mariatta81)

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyBay 2019
item.description:
The Baked Bear

The Baked Bear is known for their ice cream sandwiches!

üç¶üòùü§≥ #IceCreamSelfie #PyBay2019 pic.twitter.com/GE6icRnLW6

— Mariatta ü§¶ (@mariatta) August 19, 2019

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCon US 2019
item.description:
Cathy’s Gourmet Ice Cream Sandwiches

PyCon US 2019 was a busy one for me. I gave a talk, a tutorial, and also ran the first Mentored Sprints with Nina Zakharenko and Tania Allard, AND co-chaired the Python Language Summit for the first time üòµ (I ended up co-charing it for 4 years).

I went to Cathy’s Gourmet Ice Cream Sandwiches. The ice cream sandwich was really yummy! üòã

I’m sad to hear that this place has since closed down.

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ North Bay Python 2018
item.description:
Angela’s Organic Ice Cream Petaluma

One perk of being a keynote at North Bay Python is you get to headline and have your name up on the marquee ‚≠êÔ∏è It’s really cool!

Thanks North Bay Python for inviting me! I get to immortalize it in my ice cream selfie üòù

Little did I know that I would return to the conference, and back to Angela’s Organic Ice Cream five years later!

üç¶üòãü§≥ A very special #IceCreamSelfie #nbpy pic.twitter.com/4feYSs2lRg

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ DjangoCon US 2018
item.description:
Hammond’s Gourmet Ice Cream

It was fun visiting San Diego for DjangoCon US 2018. I gave my talk Don’t Be a Robot; Build the Bot. I think it was well received üòä

This was also a special travel trip, because, well it happens that my husband also needed to travel for work at the same time, so we don’t have anyone to look after our two kids. I ended up taking my kids with me to the conference.

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCon US 2018
item.description:
Mitchell’s Ice Cream

At PyCon US 2018, I gave my talk What is a Python Core Developer.

It was emotionally difficult to give that talk ü•≤

I went to Mitchell’s HomeMade Ice cream to celebrate.

üç¶üòãü§≥ pic.twitter.com/MG8XdAqulv

— Mariatta ü§¶ (@mariatta) May 14, 2018

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCon Canada 2017
item.description:
La Cabane De Danny

PyCon Canada happened in November, in Montreal. It was freezing cold outside, but didn’t stop me from getting ice cream. I found La Cabane De Danny, and they make ice cream with bubble waffle cone. So fun! The matcha ice cream was real good!

Unfortunately this shop has since closed down.

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCon AU 2017
item.description:
Milkcow Australia

I realized that this is the first time I’ve used the #IceCreamSelfie hashtag!!

Unfortunately, this place has since closed down.

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCon US 2017
item.description:
What’s the Scoop PDX

After giving my talk, Dial M For Mentor, I was feeling quite stressed out. My friend Jeff asked if there’s anything that would make me feel better, and I said “I wanna go get ice cream”. So we went to this place that he knew about.

At that time, I didn’t consider Ice Cream Selfie to be a “thing” yet, but I think this is when it becomes a real “tradition”.

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ DjangoCon Europe, PyCon Italy 2017
item.description:
Hero image photo by Bartek Pawlik, DjangoCon Europe.

Icy Dot Wine

I was just walking around in Florence, having given my talk at two conferences in the same week: PyCon Italy and DjangoCon Europe 2017.

At that time, Ice cream selfie isn’t quite a ritual yet, so I didn’t even know which shop this was.

After many years, I tracked down the shop name! This was from Icy Dot Wine.

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCaribbean 2017
item.description:
Puerto Rico

Kim Crayton and I went to Condado Beach prior to the conference. While there, there was an ice cream cart, and I couldn’t resist not getting ice cream.

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ DjangoCon US 2016
item.description:
Capogiro Gelato Artisans

My first ever conference talk, and my first ever Ice Cream Selfie! The rest is history.

Trio Gelato from Capogiro Gelato: Cappucino, Pistachio, and Bacio.

While my public speaking and ice cream selfies continues, sadly Capogiro Gelato Artisans has since closed down. üò¢
